Generate summary statistics¶

Usage¶

This script will generate summary statistics from a file of observed values.

The root_stats parameter is a comma-delimited list of root statistics which are mapped to a column by name.

For example, try running the following command: generate_summary_stats.py –root_stats depth_cum=soil_depth_m,depth_cum=radial_distance_from_stem_m

The obs_file file should ideally be real field data that you wish to convert to a compatible format for the root simulator.

The sblock_size parameter is used for determining the size of each soil block when dividing the soil system into a grid.

Arguments¶

Generate summary statistics from observed data.

usage: generate_summary_stats [-h] [--obs_file OBS_FILE] [--group_by GROUP_BY] [--enable_group_by {0,1}] [--copy_cols {0,1}] [--col_list COL_LIST]
                              [--dir DIR] [--out OUT] [--round ROUND] [--bins BINS] [--by_group {0,1}] [--root_stats ROOT_STATS]
                              [--sblock_size SBLOCK_SIZE] [--random_seed RANDOM_SEED]

Named Arguments¶

--obs_file

The observed root data file name. Defaults to ‘data/field/apple_tree_root_data.csv’.

Default: “data/field/apple_tree_root_data.csv”

--group_by

A comma-delimited list of column names to group by. Defaults to ‘experiment_id,tree_id,age’.

Default: “experiment_id,tree_id,age”

--enable_group_by

Possible choices: 0, 1

Enable group by functionality. Defaults to ‘1’.

Default: 1

--copy_cols

Possible choices: 0, 1

Whether to directly copy columns from the existing dataframe. Defaults to ‘1’.

Default: 1

--col_list

A comma-delimited list of column names to group by. Defaults to ‘mean_rld_cm_cm3,total_root_to_1m__kg_per_plant’.

Default: “mean_rld_cm_cm3,total_root_to_1m__kg_per_plant”

--dir

Output directory. Defaults to ‘data/summary_stats’.

Default: “data/summary_stats”

--out

Output CSV file name. Defaults to ‘root_stats.csv’.

Default: “root_stats.csv”

--round

Number of decimal places to round values when writing to file. Defaults to ‘10’.

Default: 10

--bins

Number of bins when binning root data. Defaults to ‘10’.

Default: 10

--by_group

Possible choices: 0, 1

Create on csv file per group. Defaults to ‘1’.

Default: 1

--root_stats

A comma-delimited list of summary statistics mapped to a column name. Defaults to ‘depth_cum=soil_depth_m,depth_cum=radial_distance_from_stem_m’.

Default: “depth_cum=soil_depth_m,depth_cum=radial_distance_from_stem_m”

--sblock_size

The (voxel) size of each soil block in cubic-cm. Defaults to ‘1’.

Default: 1

--random_seed

The random seed. Defaults to ‘None’.
